venue.name: Toby Keith's I Love This Bar & Grill

item.description:
The Tom Dixon band playing this Friday night is awesome and had us dancing all night the last time we went.   There is also a national act, James Wesley playing.

Because of the national act the cover is $10 that night and in the past they have not started charging a cover until 9 PM.

I will shoot to be there at 8:30.

check out the website- http://countrybarma.com/live-music-events

Look for Mark Amadeus near the entrance at the top of the ramp on the left.  I am 6'3", easy to spot and my cell is 508-922-1690.

This is posted in two meetup groups.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Mark Amadeus near the entrance at the top of the ramp on the left.
item.name: Live Country Music & Dancing at Toby Keiths Friday Night You All
